name: Changing RDP Port to Non Standard Number
description:
Remote desktop is a common feature in operating systems.
It allows a user to log into an interactive session with a system desktop graphical user interface on a remote system.
Microsoft refers to its implementation of the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) as Remote Desktop Services (RDS).
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:HKLM\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Terminal\ Server\\WinStations\\RDP\-Tcp\\PortNumber) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Details:DWORD\ \(0x00000d3d\))))`
